name: leering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
looking or behaving in a way that shows sexual interest, especially when this is not wanted: Young actresses were subjected to leering "lunches" with studio executives. Their latest comedy is raucous, leering, crude and, to my mind, largely misjudged.
More examplesFewer examplesShe ignored a leering creep who remarked, "Shame you're only 17".Sometimes she would see his evil, leering face bearing down upon her, and she would wake gasping for air.They broadcast leering lingerie commercials masquerading as entertainment shows.
